TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GridItemPattern/GridItemPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.
Docs.related: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients
Implementing the UI Automation GridItem Control Pattern
Implementing the UI Automation Grid Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.
Docs.value: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item. The default value is 0.

remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationFocusChangedEvent> listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet1015"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet1015"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet102"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet102"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet103"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet103":::

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnSpan As Integer
public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.
Docs.value: The number of columns spanned. The default value is 1.

remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationFocusChangedEvent> listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet1015"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet1015"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet102"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet102"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet103"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet103":::

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainingGrid As AutomationElement

Docs.summary: Gets a UI Automation element that supports and represents the container of the cell or item.
Docs.value: A UI Automation element that supports the GridPattern and represents the table cell or item container. The default is a null reference ( in Microsoft Visual Basic .NET).

remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationFocusChangedEvent> listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet1015"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet1015"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet102"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet102"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet103"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet103":::

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Row As Integer
public: property int Row { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.
Docs.value: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the row containing the table cell or item. The default value is 0.

remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationFocusChangedEvent> listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowSpan As Integer
public: property int RowSpan { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of rows spanned by a cell or item.
Docs.value: The number of rows spanned. The default value is 1.

remarks.format:
